text:
@realDonaldTrump @PeteHegseth @marklevinshow @FoxNews Hello #ImpeachedPresidentTrump.
Not a hoax, Senate Intel Cmte already ruled it real. Much like the coronavirus is a hoax, huh? Nothing but lies and bullshit from you.
